item.title: Rear Entertainment in a Nissan NV 3500
item.description: The Silver Fox We recently purchased a new 2018 Nissan NV 3500 SL passenger van that I've taken to calling the “Silver Fox”. With the addition of our twins we simply couldn't fit all 6 kids reasonably into the Honda Odyssey anymore. I confided in friends that watching my wife pull up at the school to unload kids one day was the final straw for me. As kids crawled out from under the two rear facing twin car seats, it reminded me of a clown car packed with an endless stream of children.
